summary: The module implements a specialized diffusion pipeline that enables prompt-to-prompt editing by intercepting and manipulating attention mechanisms within a Stable Diffusion model. It provides a suite of controllers and utilities to store, replace, reweight, and blend attention maps, align token sequences, and adjust generation parameters, allowing fine‑grained control over how textual prompts influence the generated images.
business_intent: To give artists and developers precise, programmable control over AI‑generated images, facilitating targeted edits, style transfers, and creative variations through prompt manipulation without retraining the underlying model.
